description: Create a job production plan material type quality control requirement.
permissions: User must be authorized to create the requirement through the related job production plan material type (delegated policy).
side_effects: Triggers job production plan recap generation after commit.
validation_notes: job-production-plan-material-type and quality-control-classification are required. quality-control-classification must be unique within a job production plan material type. quality-control-classification must belong to the same broker as the job production plan material type.

flags.name: --job-production-plan-material-type
flags.description: Job production plan material type ID
